role_description: An Ansible role that installs LXD on Linux platforms and LXC on Windows and MacOS
role_description_full_overview: [LXD](https://linuxcontainers.org) is a next generation system container manager. It offers a user experience similar to virtual machines but using Linux containers instead
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs LXD on Linux platforms and LXC on Windows and MacOS.
